thread.title: Gary Barlow reveals why he REALLY walked off The One Show mid-interview - but Howard Donald isn't so sure
thread.title_full: Gary Barlow reveals why he REALLY walked off The One Show mid-interview - but Howard Donald isn't so sure

author: Hayley Minn
title: Gary Barlow reveals why he REALLY walked off The One Show mid-interview - but Howard Donald isn't so sure
text:
(Photo: BBC) 
Everyone looked shocked as he rushed out the studio and off camera. 
And then, as Angela Scanlon continued to conduct the interview with Howard and Mark, Mark said: "I feel a bit weird now." 
Howard assured: "He'll be alright." 
Take That fans were quick to assume he had an upset stomach. Read More (Photo: BBC) (Photo: BBC) 
But Gary has revealed why he really had to rush out the studio, putting it down to a "hot dressing room". 
Taking to Twitter, Gary said: "Thank you all for the messages. I'm absolutely fine. 
"We had a very hot dressing room and I thought I was gong to faint on live TV !" 
However, his band mate Howard has said viewers of The One Show were right, tweeting: "Please don't worry about Gary. He told me he was touching cloth before he went on. 
"He obviously went off to lay one. X" 
*The One Show continues on BBC One weekdays at 7pm Like us on Facebook
